article_text:
To invest in the future, we must sometimes look in the past. We at Motif Investing have put together an infographic highlighting some of 2014?s most polarizing, yet profitable investing ideas.

Investment opportunities are everywhere. The key is to not let your biases cloud your judgment. Motif Investing helps you turn ideas into action. May 2015 be as prosperous and bright!

H/T SparkLine

Most Profitable Investing Ideas Of 2014

Infographic source: Motif Investing
